Module SD_Project
Package shared_regions

Class GeneralRepos

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared_regions.GeneralRepos
  • public class GeneralRepos
extends java.lang.Object
    General Repository. Responsible to keep the visible internal state of the problem and to provide means for it to be printed in the logging file.

    • Constructor Summary
